data.actual_result: All our and our caller's voices are being broadcasted onto voice channel, also other people interfere our phone call.
data.expected_result: I should have been auto-disconnected or muted/deafened or had another way that disables Discord activity on our side.
data.short_description: When I accept/make a phone call on Discord Android, I add my mom to voice chat.
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to any voice channel on Android, - Accept an ongoing phone call/make a phone call, - People in the voice channel can hear all you say and hear through you, - Also Discord's voice channel sound management is treated as a "call" type rather than "media" so it's minimum possible voice is still too high and requires one to lower every person's voice level around to 30% one by one; this "call" type treatment is probably the reason Discord doesn't get suppressed by the phone call and interferes it.
